query.name: findStudyByUser
query.sql: select sur.role_name, sur.study_id ,s.name from study_user_role sur, study s where sur.study_id = s.study_id and sur.status_id = 1 and sur.role_name != 'admin' and sur.user_name=? order by sur.study_id asc

query.name: findAllByParent
query.sql: SELECT study_id,name FROM STUDY WHERE parent_study_id=? order by study_id asc

query.name: findAllByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT sur.* FROM study_user_role sur, study st WHERE sur.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) order by sur.date_updated desc

query.name: findAllByStudyIdAndLimit
query.sql: SELECT sur.* FROM study_user_role sur, study st WHERE sur.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) order by sur.date_updated desc limit 5

query.name: findAllUsersByStudy
query.sql: SELECT ua.user_name , ua.first_name , ua.last_name , sur.role_name , sur.study_id , sur.status_id , sur.date_updated , sur.update_id , s.name , s.parent_study_id , ua.user_id FROM user_account ua , study_user_role sur , study s WHERE ua.user_name=sur.user_name AND (sur.study_id=s.study_id) AND ua.status_id=1 AND sur.status_id=1 AND (s.study_id=? OR s.parent_study_id=?) AND ua.user_name NOT LIKE '%.SS_%' ORDER BY ua.date_created ASC

query.name: findAllAssignedUsersByStudy
query.sql: SELECT ua.user_name , ua.first_name , ua.last_name , sur.role_name , sur.study_id , sur.status_id , sur.date_updated , sur.update_id , s.name , s.parent_study_id , ua.user_id FROM user_account ua , study_user_role sur , study s WHERE ua.user_name=sur.user_name AND (sur.study_id=s.study_id) AND ua.status_id=1 AND sur.status_id!=0 AND (s.study_id=? OR s.parent_study_id=?) AND ua.user_name NOT LIKE '%.SS_%' ORDER BY ua.date_created ASC

query.name: findAllUsersByStudyOrSite
query.sql: SELECT ua.user_name , ua.first_name , ua.last_name , sur.role_name , sur.study_id , sur.status_id , sur.date_updated , sur.update_id , s.name , s.parent_study_id , ua.user_id FROM user_account ua , study_user_role sur , study s WHERE ua.user_name=sur.user_name AND (sur.study_id=s.study_id) AND ua.status_id=1 AND sur.status_id=1 AND (s.study_id=? OR s.study_id=? AND ua.user_name NOT LIKE '%.SS_%' OR s.study_id in (select ss.study_id from study_subject ss WHERE ss.study_subject_id=?) ) ORDER BY ua.last_name ASC

query.name: findAllByRole
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ON(uc.user_name) uc.* FROM study_user_role sur, user_account uc WHERE sur.user_name=uc.user_name and (sur.role_name=? OR sur.role_name=?)
